long: A beautifully crafted platinum crown is embedded with sapphires.
A large, wooden cane supports the weight of the largest of titans.
A thick robe of chalons is simple in design.
An obsidian tipped spear is sharp and deadly.
A long robe in lined with soft rabbit fur.
A chemise of the finest quality has been sewn from burnet.
A small, cotton pouch carries an aura of magic.
A shroud covers the body of the wearer completely.
A torch of magic provides a place for flames of chaos to live.
A woolen cloak brings a shroud of darkness to the wearer.
A heavy robe of damask is embroidered with a snow rose.
A thick, rope belt has a string of wooden prayer beads attached.
Created from shavings of obsidian, a dagger has a deadly edge.
An aura of evil invades the mind to cause nightmares.
A simple, octagonal pendant hangs on a silver chain.
A steel gauntlet bears the crest of Terrason.
A pewter pendant is thought to bring good luck to the owner.
{xA steel staff is used by the Terrason guard.
A simple necklace is made of wooden prayer beads.
A finely woven robe bears the mark of the snow rose.
A polearm is designed with the mark of the snow rose.
A large book is bound with fine black leather and tied closed.
Tiny strands of silver are braided into a small bracelet.
A pair of sleeves are sewn from old russet.
A well-crafted mace bears the mark of the snow rose.
A large hat is made from thick leather and still canvas.
A metal shield bears the crest of Terrason.
A cotton overdress is well made and soft to the touch.
A robe of damask is carefully stiched, plain and sturdy.
A large candle burns at both ends, its fire hot and continuous.
A simple felt hat has stirrups to hold it in place.
Dark blue wool is woven into a sturdy, if dull looking, tunic.
A heavy vest of dark wool carries a musty smell.
A badge of pewter is meant to bring the wearer good luck.
A pile of linen is fashioned into a large pair of pants.
Strands of silver are woven into a pair of sturdy gauntlets.
Old wool, dirty and torn, is sewn into the rough likeness of a doublet.
A hood made of cotton bears the mark of the snow rose.

short: an overdress marked with the {mroyal{x crest
long: An overdress of fine damask is marked with Terrason's royal crest.
A quill pen is made from a crow's feather.
A slender bracelet is made from a thin, twisted piece of copper.
A heavy sash is embroidered with a beautiful snow rose.
Thick brown canvas is cut and sewn into a nice pair of trousers.
A cape made from plain, black cotton, remains in good condition despite use.
A black vest is sewn from stiff cotton.
A large chest plate of steel provides protection for the heart.
A small lantern glows through intricate designs covering the metal.
A dark sash has been woven into a cloth band to fit around the neck.

short: a pair of tattered, linen armbands
long: Torn and tattered linen is sewn into a pair of armbands.
A bronze trumpet is loud enough to call the entire city to the palace.
A coil of rope is frayed at both ends and brown from dirt.
A hat of straw lacks decoration or a fancy style.
A heavy staff is marked with a snow rose.
A single bracer of brass is plain and simple in design.
A fine tunic of damask has the royal crest of Terrason embroidered upon it.
A thick, wool chemise protects against the coldest of weather.
A pair of linen shortpants are sewn for young boys to wear.
A circlet of obsidian is small enough to fit a child's wrist.
A pile of linen is old and in poor condition.
A silver sword is inscribed with a snow rose.
A small band of silver has a single pearl imbedded.
Long ribbons of leather protect feet as they are wrapped around.
A fine shawl is made from carded wool as soft as silk.

short: a ceramic badge of good luck
long: A small, white badge is worn to bring luck to the owner.
A simple badge of pewter is a symbol of good luck.
A long, slender whip of black leather promises a hideous death.
{xA dark axe's blade glints with deadly poison.
The handle of a flail is inscribed with a snow rose.
A large helm made of iron sits here collecting dust.
A tunic of wool has been dyed midnight blue.
A heavy robe is made from the blackest wool that can be found.
A statue of the master of darkest evil has been carved from obsidian.
A cloak of dark wool bears in a "J" embroidered upon the neck.
An image of madness is painted upon a parchment.
A pair of lead leggings are not designed for comfort.
A conical hat is made of sturdy canvas and leather stitches.
Leather sandles are cut for comfort, not style.
The shape of a chaotic storm cloud is created from a rough diamond.
A blood-red wand carries an aura of dark magic.
A long twig is painted purple with magic.
A twig from a redwood is covered with old leaves.
A slender twig comes from the white bark of an aspen tree.
A brown twig is twisted almost into a circle.
A blue twig is bent nearly in half.
A small, green twig hums as magic moves through it.
A blank parchment is crumpled and a little torn on the edges.
A white parchment carries words of goodness.
A dark parchment contains words of evil.
A beautifully scribed scroll is tied with a small, silver satin ribbon.
A clear, glass bottle is half full of a bright {Ggreen{x liquid.
A small, glass bottle carries a few drops of a bright {Bblue{x liquid.
A glass bottle filled with green liquid is painfully hot to the touch.
A tall, slender bottle is filled with frothing {Wwhite{x liquid.
A glass bottle contains a large quantity of dark {mmagenta{x liquid.
A glass bottle is filled to the top with a bright {Rred{x liquid.
